item.description:
Hello all.... I'm hosting a rocking New Year's eve party for us and a few other Meetup groups. It's centrally located at the BBC in Walpole, where the Anniversary Bash was in 2010. Feel free to invite friends. Here are the specifics:

This is another installment in the multiple MEETUP Dance Series with Food, DJ and Champagne Toast Included. You know it's going to be fun. Singles, couples and those in between are all welcome!

What is the Multiple MEETUP Dance Series? .... it was created for us 40 +/- somethings who want to go out and have fun with people our age, to Dance to a wide variety of music and not just the newest top 40, without being blasted into deafness... We still rock ... we just do it our style...

We have their function room on the 2nd floor all to ourselves. It's a very nice room with it's own dance floor, bar and bathrooms. We have the room from 8pm -1 am.

Please pay via PAYPAL with this link

Walpole BCC = http://www.aformalaffairdj.com/pricing.htm#bbc

 

Walk-ins are welcome if there is still availability. But I think we're going to sell out. Where can you get DJ, food, a great dancefloor, Champagne toast at a nice venue on New Years Eve for $25 ?

Refunds if this event is canceled, or by finding someone to take your place only. This is gonna be fun... sign up now!

If you don't live close please consider getting a room. I negotiated a rate of $80 (reg $135) per night for 20 rooms so call soon - you can split with someone.

Holiday Inn Express Hotel Sharon
www.hiexpress.com - 395 Old Post Rd, Sharon - (781) 784-1000

Please sign up fast. The event is limited to 100 people and I expect to sell out.
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd Floor Room - Enter through the Takeout door at the front of the bldg. We have the entire 2nd floor

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: New Years Eve Dance Party at the Walpole BBC
